features.featureTitle: Ensure the admin portal is fully accessible and visible. The route /admin-login must render the AdminLogin page, and after successful login with credentials (admin/admin123), the user must be redirected to /owner-dashboard. All admin routes (/owner-dashboard, /admin/stock, /admin/sales, /admin/revenue, /admin/customers, /admin/enquiries, /admin/income, /admin/trending, /admin/products, /admin/reports) must be protected by AdminGuard and render correctly inside AdminLayout with the full sidebar navigation. Verify that AdminGuard correctly reads sessionStorage keys 'admin-session' and 'adminSessionActive' and does not redirect authenticated users away.

Apply and enforce a neon dark black-and-green theme consistently across the entire application â€” both the admin portal and public-facing pages. The theme must use a near-black background (e.g., #0a0a0a or #0d0d0d), bright neon green accents (e.g., #00ff88 or #39ff14), dark card surfaces, and glowing neon light effects on key interactive elements (buttons, nav links, cards, headings). Update frontend/src/index.css CSS custom properties and frontend/tailwind.config.js color tokens so the neon palette is applied globally. Ensure all pages (Home, Products, About, Contact, AdminLogin, AdminDashboard, OwnerDashboard, StockManagement, SalesPage, etc.) reflect this theme with no remnants of conflicting or default light/blue themes.
